participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and passionate about music and teaching. Enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I like to listen to music on my way to work. I rode my motorcycle across the country. I have a horse named Beauty. I am a Steelers fan. My family is full of witty people and we love cats.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and expressive, loves fashion and has a passion for healthy living.
participant_2.background: I like to eat healthy foods so that I have energy to teach my students. I love to be unique, and I think it's really cool to express myself through my fashion choices. I only have three best friends. I like to watch 'MA'. My parents are proud of me for following my musical dreams.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
How are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing good too! I'm a teacher, and I just got home from work.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a student, and I'm about to start my homework.
What are you studying?
I'm studying music.
Oh, that's awesome! I love music! I play guitar and sing.
That's awesome! I play piano and sing too.
Nice! What's your favorite genre of music?
I like a lot of different types of music, but my favorite is probably country.
Oh, cool! Me too! Do you like any specific country artists?
I like a lot of them, but my favorites are probably Garth Brooks and Carrie Underwood.
Those are great choices! I love Garth Brooks too.
He's so good! Do you have any pets?
I have a horse named Beauty.
That's awesome! I love horses!
She's my best friend.
I can imagine! They're such amazing creatures.
Yeah, they are.
Well, I should probably get started on my homework. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a good night!
You too!
